RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: participants receive random ancestral knowledge, lasting up to 3 days for a ritual of Good quality, and up to 5 days for a ritual of Enlightening quality. The duration will depend on the psychic sensitivity of the speaker, with each 10% increasing the duration by 2 hours.
